content:
Defense Minister Rustem Umerov, together with the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Colonel-General Alexander Syrsky conducted an important telephone conversation with the Minister of Defense of Greece Nicos Dandias.

About it reportsplaceMinistry of Defense of Ukraine.

Rustem Umerov informed the head of the defense department of Greece about the operational situation at the front.

The parties discussed the urgent needs of the Ukrainian army, in particular in artillery and ammunition.

"I am grateful to Greece and the Minister of Dendias for adamant support," Rustem Umerov said.

As reported by the Armyinform, on March 6, Prime Minister of Greece Kiriakos Michotakis came to Odessa.

Hemetwith President of Ukraine Vladimir Zelensky,VisitedRussia destroyed by the Transfiguration Cathedral and inspected the work of the Odessa Sea Commercial Port.
title: The Ministers of Defense of Ukraine and Greece discussed the need of the Armed Forces in artillery and ammunition
